mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BLOG ( BLOG_NO, MEM_NO, BLOG_TITLE, BLOG_INTRODUCE, BLOG_IMG, BLOG_INTEREST, PLANT_PREFER ) VALUES ( SEQ_BLOG.NEXTVAL, #{ memNo }, #{ blogTitle }, #{ blogIntroduce }, #{ blogImg }, #{ blogInterest }, #{ plantPrefer } )
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET BLOG_NO = SEQ_BLOG.CURRVAL WHERE MEM_NO = #{ memNo }
mapper.select: SELECT BLOG_NO, MEM_NO, BLOG_TITLE, BLOG_INTRODUCE, BLOG_IMG, BLOG_INTEREST FROM TB_BLOG WHERE BLOG_NO = #{ blogNo }
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BLOG SET BLOG_TITLE = #{ blogTitle }, BLOG_INTRODUCE = #{ blogIntroduce }, BLOG_INTEREST = #{ blogInterest }, PLANT_PREFER = #{ plantPrefer } WHERE BLOG_NO = #{ blogNo }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BLOG_CATEGORY_SETTING ( CATEGORY_SETTING_NO, BLOG_NO, CATEGORY_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_CATEGORY_SETTING_NO.NEXTVAL, #{ blogNo }, #{ categoryNo } )
mapper.select: SELECT CATEGORY_SETTING_NO, CATEGORY_MEM_NAME, CATEGORY_NO FROM TB_BLOG_CATEGORY_SETTING WHERE BLOG_NO = #{ blogNo }
